comments:
Driver:  0617I

- Create flexible project g1, module g1m1 targetting Geronimo 1.0.  Make sure 
to select to "add module to EAR project to add it to g1m1EAR.
- Create Geronimo server.
- To workaround 99735 (unable to add module to Geronimo), create a Tomcat 
server.  
- After the Tomcat server is created, the module g1m1 can then be added to 
Geronimo.
- Go through bottom-up scenario with Echo bean in g1.
- On the third page, the wizard banner validation complains about "the project 
g1m1EAR has a server target which is incompatible with the server type".  The 
server type is correctly show as Geronimo 1.0.

- If I enter a g1m1EARNew for the EAR name and hit Next twice, I got the error:
